column1: Art Institute of Chicago////It was fairly crowded
column2: but too not bad. Pictures were allowed in most areas (without flash). Also
column3: if you have a cell phone
column4: you cannot talk inside most galleries. I probably witnessed 4 or 5 instances were security told people on their phone to leave the gallery and talk elsewhere. If your coming to the AIC
column6: and enjoy something else beside discussing what so and so put on their Facebook status....
